categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens actors

nodes.text: Emun Elliott (born November 28, 1983) is a Scottish actor who portrayed Lieutenant Taslin Brance in the film Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens (2015). He is also known for his role in the science fiction film Prometheus (2012), and for playing leading roles in several television shows, including Dr. Christian King in the BBC One sci-fi police drama Paradox, Marillion in Game of Thrones, Jay Adams in Lip Service, and Richie Valentine in Threesome.
